languages.text: "Процветание протектората фон Валанциус для меня не менее важно. Ты — единственный, кто в полном объеме владеет знаниями об устройстве корабля. Думаю, в будущем я буду придерживаться твоих рекомендаций".

"The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."
languages.original_text: "Процветание протектората фон Валанциус для меня не менее важно. Ты — единственный, кто в полном объеме владеет знаниями об устройстве корабля. Думаю, в будущем я буду придерживаться твоих рекомендаций".

traits.locale_text: "The prosperity of the von Valancius empire is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

"The prosperity of the von Valancius empire is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

"The prosperity of the von Valancius empire is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

"The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

languages.text: “冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的繁荣对我而言同样重要。你是这艘船上唯一一个对王朝运作方式有着全面了解的人，我今后打算遵循你的建议。”
languages.original_text: "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

traits.locale_text: “冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的繁荣对我而言同样重要。你是这艘船上唯一一个对王朝运作方式有着全面了解的人，我今后打算遵循你的建议。”

languages.text: «La prosperidad del protectorado von Valancius es igual de importante para mí. Usted es la única persona que sabe a fondo cómo funcionan las cosas en esta nave. Creo que seguiré sus recomendaciones de aquí en adelante».
languages.original_text: "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

traits.locale_text: «La prosperidad del protectorado von Valancius es igual de importante para mí. Usted es la única persona que sabe a fondo cómo funcionan las cosas en esta nave. Creo que seguiré sus recomendaciones de aquí en adelante».

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の繁栄は、私にとって同じくらい重要だ。お前は、この船の運営方法について包括的な知識を持っている唯一の人物だ。将来的には、その勧告に従おう」
languages.original_text: "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の繁栄は、私にとって同じくらい重要だ。お前は、この船の運営方法について包括的な知識を持っている唯一の人物だ。将来的には、その勧告に従おう」

languages.text: "Der Wohlstand des Protektorats von Valancius ist mir ebenso wichtig. Niemand außer Euch weiß, wie die Dinge auf diesem Schiff laufen. Ich denke, ich werde weiter auf Eure Empfehlungen hören."
languages.original_text: "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

traits.locale_text: "Der Wohlstand des Protektorats von Valancius ist mir ebenso wichtig. Niemand außer Euch weiß, wie die Dinge auf diesem Schiff laufen. Ich denke, ich werde weiter auf Eure Empfehlungen hören."

languages.text: « La prospérité du protectorat von Valancius est tout aussi importante à mes yeux. Vous êtes la seule personne à bord qui sache exactement comment fonctionne ce vaisseau. À l'avenir, je ne manquerai pas de suivre vos recommandations. »
languages.original_text: "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

traits.locale_text: « La prospérité du protectorat von Valancius est tout aussi importante à mes yeux. Vous êtes la seule personne à bord qui sache exactement comment fonctionne ce vaisseau. À l'avenir, je ne manquerai pas de suivre vos recommandations. »

languages.text: "Von Valancius protektorasının refahı, benim için de önemli. Bu gemide işlerin nasıl işlediğini en ufak ayrıntısına kadar bilen sensin. Bundan sonra senin önerilerine göre hareket edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "The prosperity of the von Valancius protectorate is just as important to me. You are the only person who has comprehensive knowledge of how things are run on this ship. I think in the future I will follow your recommendations."

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius protektorasının refahı benim için de önemli. Bu gemide işlerin nasıl yürüdüğüne dair geniş kapsamlı bilgi sahibi tek kişi sensin. Bundan sonra senin önerilerine göre hareket edeceğiz."
